name: Onefold Crush
description:
Twitter  •  Twitch •  Github  •  Itch.io

This project is made to test the self-made visual-novel asset. The main project will include more characters, longer, more fleshed out story, and quite more features on the way.

Note From the Developer: Thank you for trying out our "Visual Novel Project". The initial plan was to have 2 love interests but due to my teammate being busy and my lack of writing experience, I had to remove one of them, We are planning to add more characters in the future, with a bit more fleshed out story and longer playtime. Either way, I hope you enjoyed the little prototype nonetheless!

Engine -  Unity Engine

Art Software -  MediBangPaint Pro
